description: Razorpay is an Indian fintech company that provides online payment gateway services for businesses.

faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay enables businesses to accept and process online payments via credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking and wallets.

faq.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faq.answer: Razorpay is for startups, e-commerce stores, SaaS companies, freelancers, and enterprises that want to accept digital payments.

faq.question: Does Razorpay have a free plan?
faq.answer: Razorpay does not have a subscription fee. You only pay per successful transaction.

faq.question: What is the pricing?
faq.answer: 2% per transaction for domestic cards, UPI, wallets and net banking. 3% for international cards.

faq.question: How can I integrate Razorpay?
faq.answer: Integration options include checkout, payment links, hosted pages, plugins (Shopify, WooCommerce, etc.) and APIs.
